name: Torch Runner (itch) (Azure Indie)
description:
You have an important message to carry, a lantern to send it with, and a beacon to light. Keep the flames alive, and deliver the message.

Controls:

Move LeftA or Left Arrow Key
Move RightD or Right Arrow Key
JumpW or Up Arrow Key
Move Lantern
Mouse

Tips:

  • When up against a wall, you fall slower (and even slower still while holding Jump
  • You can jump off of walls by holding Jump and pressing the Direction key away from the wall.
